EmailTemplate.description: Email sent confirm Design Job Completed and requesting rating
EmailTemplate.name: Design Job Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Design Job Completed - {!Design_Job__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School Group System Message
Dear {!Design_Job__c.Contact_Person__c},
Ashley has marked as complete, a design job for {!Design_Job__c.Work_For__c}. The basic details are
Subject: {!Design_Job__c.Copy_Subject__c} Date Completed: {!Design_Job__c.Date_Completed__c}
IMPORTANT: Please proceed with rating the work performed, using the following link:
{!Design_Job__c.Link}
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Moscow- Kuala Lumpur -Sao Paulo - Manila - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Marbella - Pamplona
